trans-unit.source: Specifies the set of modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il set dei tasti di modifica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class is the set of the modifier keys that are currently pressed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>classe è il set di tasti di modifica che attualmente premuti.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that make use of the ModifierKeys enumeration are the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A> properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> classes.
trans-unit.target: Alcuni [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] che impiegano i ModifierKeys enumerazione sono il <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A>proprietà il <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.Modifiers%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreModifierKeys* One or more modifier keys, defined by the ModifierKeys enumeration, delimited with a "+" character.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` ``` # # valori XAML *oneOrMoreModifierKeys* uno o più tasti di modifica, definiti dall'enumerazione ModifierKeys, delimitata da un carattere "+".
